EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell HQ - Cloud Foundry Meetup.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry meetup at Honeywell HQ in Morris Plains on Feb 4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join other industry leaders, including top Pharma, and learn how to build microservices architecture, at scale, with Spring Cloud <[[http://projects.spring.io/spring-cloud/]]> at this week's New Jersey Cloud Foundry meetup.
Date: February 4, 2016 Time 7:00PM to 9:30PM
Register Here <[[http://www.meetup.com/New-Jersey-Cloud-Foundry-Meetup/events/228022463/]]>
We hope to see a few folks from your organization at the event.
The Spring Team by Pivotal
